Articles.Content: Does the EVAparachutes.dll and .cs file need to go in a specific folder or will anywhere in gameplay work?
Anywhere, and the .cs is just source code so you don't even need that. Just be aware that EVAparachutes.dll alone doesn't work, you still have to download the mod itself.

Hey Kreuzung, long time no text. A while back I saw some new models for both boxes. Really was excited about them, but I have not heard nor seen anything more. Are they still in the making, or did the deal fall through?

Thx to all Modders for keeping KSP alive for many of us.

Dren

Hey Kreuzung, long time no text. A while back I saw some new models for both boxes. Really was excited about them, but I have not heard nor seen anything more. Are they still in the making, or did the deal fall through?

I've messed around with the png files. For some reasons I can't add a screen shot here. In the zip I've included the textures and the psd files for easy replacement of textures. https://www.dropbox.com/s/psf70o8r4e7wiq0/textures.zip

Hey Papa, thx for the new textures. I cant seem to get the chutes to function though. I see them in the UI choices, but no joy with trying to open one. I can eject just fine, but since the ROF is a bit much for even Jeb to handle with out the chutes, I'm not getting to use my favorite survival Mod.

Patiently awaiting the .24 release

Thx for putting in the time man. It might get old seeing my "Thank you" at the end of every post I make, but truly, I wouldn't be playing with out these great mods.

Dren
Someone had mentioned a while back that there is a module manager file to add the ejection module to the command modules by default. Could someone provide a link to that?

Just get the file on page 6 where it gives all kerbals a parachute it works great and all you have to do is press space + F , I don't play with out it http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25305-0-23-Vanguard-Technologies-EVA-parachutes-23!-Sry-4-not-fixing-earlier-(Dec-30)/page6?p=442982&viewfull=1#post442982
Thx Jimmy, seems I had an issue with a conflicting dll. Got it straight and now I can fly like a true test pilot should..... way faster than my parachute is rated for
Replaced download links with Dropbox ones for now, also added a controls section (the word "controls" was already there, but somehow not followed by any text, lol).
do i put the "kerbals always have parachutes" .cfg file in GameData? or in VNG?
It's a dll not a cfg and it doesn't matter where you put it.

Little help please, ejector module is not appearing in my tech tree.... box is, everything else seems fine, and there is a greyed out option for it in the VAB etc saying need to purchase tech.

Ross

Ok I have a problem......

I dont know how to install the plugin.

Also when i hit the parachute box it says no target. when i use space-f the game lags, and from the kerbal menu it also says no target. How do i fix this, and sorry for the horrible grammar.
Would be too much to ask for automatic parachute deploying?
A question: do any other mods use the Vanguard mod? Or just this one? Because it's a bit weird if you have to install 2 mod folders for one mod...

>Javster

Lack's Luster Labs (though it's optional for that), ASET deployable light globe, ASET colour-changing lights, and a few other ones I think.

>theattackcorgi

First, the "no target" messages are unrelated to this mod and appear in the stock game as well if you left-click fast enough. Did you install both the plugin and the parts? Can you check if GameData\VNG\parachute\model.mu exists?
I also get No Target, jeb didn't make it.

To quote the post I wrote 20 hours ago right above yours,

[...] the "no target" messages are unrelated to this mod and appear in the stock game as well if you left-click fast enough. [...]

Made a texture for the ejector that doesn't glow in the dark so much

Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/15214821/ejectionmodule.png

Throw the png into the textures folder and overwrite the old one.
